name: Old Residence
description:
While I was updating that horrible game called BlockGL, I decided to make a small, short game, About you leaving your old house to get a new one. Normally, you would feel good about this...But something feels like it's begging you to come back. Your guilt. You don't have to do something that you don't want to do.

W, A, S, D To move, Click to interact, F to toggle flashlight
